name: Escapee Mint
description:
Goal: Stay alive and find the correct exit to escape successfully.

Controls:

  • Press the W, A, S, D keys to control the character.
  • Escape key pauses the game. Pressing the Escape key again unpauses the game.
  • To attack, hover over the thing you want to attack and press the left mouse button.
  • Save game by pausing the game and selecting the "save" button.
  • The "resume" button is disabled if no save file is found.

Important Note:

  • There is no way to gain life or health in this game. It is up to you to stay alive.
  • The exit is a glowing, blue circle. Not the pentagrams.
  • There are fake exits!
  • The game was made in a rush so there will probably be some bugs I am unaware of.
  • Lastly, thank you for playing my (first) game!
